INSIDE THE ARK

As Uproar and Quickstride follow Leo II and Wing Caliber up=
 towards the
bridge, the trip is nothing if not dark and silent. There is v=
irtually no
sound, except for the small sounds that the four themselves mak=
e as they
walked.

Leo II and Wing Caliber both seem adept at walking sound=
lessly, staying
close to the shadows, but in this oppressive silence, even =
their footfalls
could be heard at times, magnified by the echoing in the ha=
lls.

As they approach the bridge, the door actually slid open as the get c=
lose =96
apparently even if the rest of the ship is without power, the brid=
ge still
has it.

Screens line the walls as Leo II, Wing Caliber, Quickstri=
de and Uproar walk
on the bridge.

=93Where is the intruder.=94 Leo II grow=
led under his breath. He also sniffed
the air looking for any trace of him.=


Wing Caliber walked over to one of the console, =93Sir look!=94

Leo II w=
alked over to see what Wing Caliber was pointing at. And there on
the scree=
n was the image of the front bay where the inert forms of Optimus
Prime and=
 Megatron as well as the other Autobots and Decepticons were
laying. Howeve=
r in the corner of the screen there was a timed count down of
2 minutes.

=
=93It=92s a bomb!=94 Caliber said. =93We have to get back to the main chamb=
er, now!=94

It was only then that there was a quiet chuckle from the corne=
r as a dark
figure stepped from the shadows. It was difficult to tell, but =
he looked
like one of the old seekers, like Thundercracker or Skywarp, alth=
ough his
marking were somewhat different. He was shrouded in dark blacks an=
d purples
and about the same size as any other Predacon or Maximal. =93No, =
you won=92t.=94
he said, his voice barely above a whisper. =93You will stay=
 here and watch
your friends, and your entire world go up in flames!=94

Th=
ere was a dark chuckle as the figure disappeared and the doors to the
bridg=
e opened and then closed, to be followed closely by a small detonation
on t=
he door!

It was locked, permanently!

> <OLD>
>
> Elita nodded, it was tim=
e to be brave, hunt the Predacon could wait; she
opened her tiny com link a=
nd call her dad"Daddy!!!! Someone hurted Uncle
Elder... He need Cr or Medic=
 bay...He has fell unconceus... he looks very
bad=93

<NEW>

Elita get=92s =
an answering call from Rodimus, =93You just stay put little one I
am on the=
 way to you now. Try to keep Lord Elder out of sight until I get
there.=94
=

Even as Rodimus spoke, almost as if he could hear them speak about him Lor=
d
Elder groaned and moved slightly, but did not regain consciousness.

> <O=
LD>
>
> =93This was a... Emotional lapsus, dont expect to wacth a lot=94sai=
d coldly
Perceptor but then his voice was tunned with a slight pride"Above =
all my
creations, the BlackFortress was the greatest=94and added with a mor=
e cold
tone=94But sometimes... Sacrifies are needed=94

<NEW>

Santon and B=
ump looked at each other and then shrugged a small smile on
their faces.

=
=93Of course.=94 Legacy said in cold tones. He turned to regard the ex Pred=
acon
scientist, =93However there may yet be time to construct another, perh=
aps
putting it to better use this time.=94




ON THE WAY BACK TO THE ARK

=
The trip back is longer then any of them had anticipated. Having to carry
a=
nd pull the large bulk of Tuscon back to the base was not the fastest mode
=
of travel.

However there did not seem to be any opposition either. There w=
as no hint of
Predacon or Decepticon energy signature to be felt. Not a sin=
gle wrong smell
and or anything out of the ordinary, except the feeling of =
being watched.

> <OLD>
>
> [Tuscon] now turns his com link on to Rodimus.
=
>
> "Rodimus, this is Tucson, I need to know the status
> of the situation =
at the Ark, over."

<NEW>

Rodimus' voice crackled as it came over Tuscon's=
 radio, "We are inside the
Ark now. I have just been told that Lord Elder i=
s damaged. We are on our way
to him now." There was a pause and then Rodimu=
s continued, "Leo II, Wing
Caliber, Uproar and Quickstride went to the brid=
ge to check things out."

There was a small sound over the radio, "Slag!" R=
odimus said after a moment.
"That sounded like a small explosion coming fro=
m the bridge. I'll get back
to you." Rodimus signed off.

Meanwhile as the =
group continued to trek back towards the Ark, high above,
barely in sight r=
ange a large dark form moved swiftly through the skies. It
was like a dark =
cloud that for a moment obscured the sun. It was not quite a
bird and more =
than some dinosaur. However even at this range its shape was
easily recogni=
zable =96 a DRAGON!

As quickly as it came it continued to move away toward=
s the north and then
east, its attention apparently on something else as if=
 disregarding the
Autobots and Maximals on the ground.

For a moment it cou=
ld be made out that the figure was carrying two other
dark forms, the forms=
 hanging in wicked clawed talons. However their
identities remained unknown=
 as the figure quickly moved further and further
away, an occasional wing f=
lap propelling it to faster and faster speeds.

"I detected Minion in that =
thing." Bantor said.

Torca grunted, "We had better get back to the Ark qui=
ckly."

With a nod they continued to pull Tuscon west, back towards the Ark=
.

(TAG)

Preston

--bcaec53f93fde5fcc5049ccfcbf5
